entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't install Release 6.0.408 on macOS #8747
  • Definitely a bug #8745
  • Some Android Emulator "devices" report incorrect Window.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay.Density #8742
  • Maui Blazor IOS platform opens script tag url in the browser #8741
  • WebView cannot show all web page content #8738
  • Issue with ListView and ObservableCollection #8734
  • Android - Shell footer occupies whole page when it contains grid RowDefinitions * #8733

Closed

  • test #8743
  • InvalidOperationException: VisualStateGroup Names must be unique #8003
  • Grid sizes do not update with bindings (regression) #8730
  • FlexLayout does not re-layout when a child's visibility changes #7621
    6.0-sr4
  • EmbeddedJar is showing in property explorer In Andriod Binding Project #8634
  • APT2000 El sistema no puede encontrar el archivo especificado. (2). file:///C:/Program%20Files/dotnet/packs/Microsoft.Android.Sdk.Windows/32.0.300-rc #8654
  • Maui - Stepper do not turn enabled #8656
  • yes 6.0.408 #8731
  • XamlCompilation does not work on Debug #8633
  • [MacCatalyst] ScrollView does not arrange accurately on window resize #8643
  • Images in subfolders not showing up on Windows but do on Android #8628
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand in CollectionView is not triggered on Windows #8627
  • Debug on 'Local iOS Device' fails with ApplicationVerificationFailed | 0xE8008015 #8469
  • Entry/Editor do not lose focus -- ContentView Binding #8623
  • Intellisense / HotReload #8624
  • [bug][android]When I add controls using code, the ScrollView doesn't scroll #6530
    6.0-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! (net7.0 / main) #8739
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22364.3 #8732
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Add bot rule to manage 's/move-to-vs-feedback' issues #8740
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make the MAUI package ID be pre.7 #8737
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert, 6.0-sr4
  • Re-enable Shell Tests #5745
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • More Unpackaged Support #8536
  • [VisualDiagnostics] Fix RectangleAdorner with updated math #8728
  • Implement menu separators #8565
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, .NET 7
  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8704
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Exclude `global.json` from iOS Bundle Resources #8724
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! (net6.0) #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8708
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8705
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8703
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8706
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8707
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8709
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
